title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

To earn the first point a response must provide a numerical difference and a quotient. A response of only or earns the first point.

To earn the second point, a response must have “bear per year per year” (or the equivalent) attached to a numerical value.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

To earn the first point, a response must provide “average,” “rate of change,” and “from time t=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0 JaaGimaaaa@3BB4@ to t=12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0 JaaGymaiaaikdaaaa@3C71@ ” (or equivalent). Units are not required to earn the first point.

To earn the second point, at least five of the six factors in the Riemann sum must be correct. The factor of 1 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@3B3C@ is assessed in the third point.

If there is any error in the Riemann sum, the response does not earn the third point.

A response of only 1 12 150 ⋅ 4+156 ⋅ 5+159 ⋅ 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaigdacaaIYaaaamaabmaabaWdaiaaigda caaI1aGaaGimaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaGjbVlaaisdacqGHRaWkca aIXaGaaGynaiaaiAdapaGaaGjbV=qacqGHflY1caaMe8UaaGynaiab gUcaRiaaigdacaaI1aGaaGyoa8aacaaMe8+dbiabgwSixlaaysW7ca aIZaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@5817@ earns the second and third points.

A response that presents the correct average value with accompanying work that does not explicitly present the six factors and/or the sum process does not earn the second point but will earn the third point. For example, responses of “ 150 ⋅ 4+156 ⋅ 5+477 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaaGymaiaaiwdacaaIWaGaaGjbVlabgwSixlaaysW7caaI 0aGaey4kaSIaaGymaiaaiwdacaaI2aWdaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaG jbVlaaiwdacqGHRaWkcaaI0aGaaG4naiaaiEdaa8aabaGaaGymaiaa ikdaaaaaaa@4F86@ ” or “ 600,  780,  477  →   1857 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aaiAdacaaIWaGaaGimaiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaaiEdacaaI4aGa aGimaiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaaisdacaaI3aGaaG4naiaaysW7ca aMe8UaeyOKH4QaaGjbVlaaysW7daWcaaqaaiaaigdacaaI4aGaaGyn aiaaiEdaaeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@53FC@ ” would earn the third point but not the second.

A response that presents an answer of 156 ⋅ 4+159 ⋅ 5+161 ⋅ 3 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaabaWdaiaaigdacaaI1aGaaGOnaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaGjb VlaaisdacqGHRaWkpaGaaGymaiaaiwdacaaI5aGaaGjbV=qacqGHfl Y1caaMe8UaaGynaiabgUcaRiaaigdacaaI2aGaaGymaiaaysW7cqGH flY1caaMe8UaaG4maaqaaiaaigdacaaIYaaaaaaa@55B7@ (which uses a right Riemann sum) earns 1 of the last 2 points. If this response is simplified, the result must be 1902 12 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaIXaGaaGyoaiaaicdacaaIYaaapaqaa8qacaaI XaGaaGOmaaaacaGGSaaaaa@3E84@ 951 6 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaI5aGaaGynaiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaaiAdaaaGa aiilaaaa@3D16@ 317 2 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaIZaGaaGymaiaaiEdaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaaGa aiilaaaa@3D0E@ or 158.5. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGynai aaiIdacaGGUaGaaGynaiaac6caaaa@3D5A@

An unsupported response of 1857 12 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaabaGaaGymaiaaiIdacaaI1aGaaG4naaqaaiaaigdacaaIYaaa aiaacYcaaaa@3E4E@ 619 4 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaI2aGaaGymaiaaiMdaa8aabaWdbiaaisdaaaGa aiilaaaa@3D15@ or 154.75 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aaigdacaaI1aGaaGinaiaac6cacaaI3aGaaGynaaaa@3D84@ does not earn the second or third point.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for a definite integral ∫ a b P  t   dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaam iuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaadgga aeaacaWGIbaaniaawUIiaOGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGaamiDaaaa@4677@ with any limits of integration. If the limits are incorrect, the response does not earn the second point.

The second point cannot be earned without the first point, and is earned only for an answer of 2185 or 2185.339 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaaGymai aaiIdacaaI1aGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaIZaGaaGyoaaaa@3EE2@ or 2185.338. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaaGymai aaiIdacaaI1aGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaIZaGaaGioaiaac6caaaa@3F93@

Missing differentials:

  • A response of only ∫ 0 12 P  t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaam iuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaaicda aeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaqdcaGLRicaaaa@41D9@ or ∫ 0 12 P  t =1885.3389 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaam iuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaaicda aeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaqdcaGLRicakiabg2da9iaaigdacaaI4aGaaG ioaiaaiwdacaGGUaGaaG4maiaaiodacaaI4aGaaGyoaaaa@4998@ earns the first point but not the second.

  • A response of 300+ ∫ 0 12 P  t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIZaGaaGimai aaicdacqGHRaWkdaWdXgqabaGaamiuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadsha aiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaaicdaaeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaqdcaGLRi caaaa@44EC@ earns the first point and in the presence of the correct answer earns the second point.

  • A response of ∫ 0 12 P  t   +300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaam iuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaSqaaiaaicda aeaacaaIXaGaaGOmaaqdcaGLRicakiaaykW7caaMc8Uaey4kaSIaaG 4maiaaicdacaaIWaaaaa@480C@ does not earn the first point but earns the second point for the correct answer.

A response that miscommunicates, e.g., ∫ 0 12 P  t   dt =1885.3389+300, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaGaam iuaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaaMc8UaaGPa VlaadsgacaWG0baaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaGymaiaaikdaa0Gaay5kIa GccqGH9aqpcaaIXaGaaGioaiaaiIdacaaI1aGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaI ZaGaaGioaiaaiMdacqGHRaWkcaaIZaGaaGimaiaaicdacaGGSaaaaa@5252@ does not earn the second point.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

A response that considers P=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGqbGaeyypa0 JaaGimaaaa@3B90@ earns the first point.

A response of “at time t=12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadshacqGH9aqpcaaIXaGaaGOmaaaa@3C90@ ” with no justification does not earn the second point.

The second point cannot be earned for any answer other than time t=12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadshacqGH9aqpcaaIXaGaaGOmaaaa@3C90@ .

Alternate solution using Candidates Test:

P  t =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGqbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaa@3FA3@ has no solutions in the interval 0≤t≤12, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaeyizIm QaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaigdacaaIYaGaaiilaaaa@403F@ so the maximum number of bears occurs at an endpoint of the interval.

The region has 300 bears at time t=0.
